settings.custom_liquid:
But how?
We use red algae.The superfood for your skin.

Through extracting Astaxanthin,the bio-active compound in red algae and a powerful antioxidant. Using our innovative cold-press technology we can preserve all the nutrients, vitamins and minerals your skin needs to improve it’s health and appearance all by itself. With zero side-effects. Our Recovery & Repair gel is a TRANSPORTER.meaning it allows much better penetration of all ingredients through the skin’s dermis and increases healthy turnover of your cells. So instead of masking the problem, we treat it.
Healthy Skin Best-Sellers

Do you have a specific skin concern?
Find out how our innovative red algae gel can help treat your specific skin concerns

No more bad skin days. Ever.
Why suffer side-effects when you don’t have to?
The Recovery & Repair Gel is 100% natural so it has zero side-effects.

settings.heading: Astaxanthin
settings.description: Astaxanthin, the bio-active compound in red algae contains ten times more vitamin A than retinol, 6000 times more potent than vitamin C and 550 times more potent than vitamin E

settings.heading: Hylauronic acid
settings.description: Hylauronic acid dries you skin out under low humidity conditions

settings.heading: Axaleic acid
settings.description: Azaleic acid causes dryness, peeling and itching of the skin.

settings.custom_liquid:
Want glowing skin?
Get a microdermabrasion...or use our gel.
Celebrities have access to the best dermatologists in the world and have the luxury of getting a microdermabrasion every week to give them that five-star glow. Imagine being able to have a microdermabrasion every day. No purging, No downtime. Simply, glowing skin. The Recovery & Repair Gel, the ultimate in non-invasive, life-changing skincare

Find out how Jane broke the cycle of bad skin for good.
Meet Jane.
She felt self-conscious, insecure and unhappy. All because of her skin.

settings.text: 'This morning I received photo and feedback that a customer never had (in last few years) perfect skin colour as of today, since using the R&R gel. She is absolutely overwhelmed!
settings.author: Dermatologist

settings.text: 'I honestly don't remember the last time my face was uniform in colour and it was the same colour after the gym! and after a shower - no redness! OMG it is so wonderful - it works!'
settings.author: TV presenter

settings.text: 'Guys you are in the top ten trending on 17 different hashtags. Honestly this only ever happened like once in seven years! I'm so happy!'
settings.author: Nathalie

settings.text: 'I thought I'd tried everything to reduce my dark spots. All my friends and family have been commenting on my skin and how good it looks. I've never had that before, it makes me feel amazing!
settings.author: Jane

settings.text: 'I started using this face gel and I can't believe how much it reduced my wrinkles!'
settings.author: Ava G

settings.text: 'After using the R&R gel for a month, I can already see my scars fading and my skin is getting better. I have been waiting a long time to be able to purchase an acne treatment that finally works!'
settings.author: Jade

settings.text: 'I have suffered from acne since I was a teenager. I thought at 34 I'd finally figured out and my skin was clear, but then life happened, stress, and I got pregnant. My face went crazy. It was the worst breakout I've ever had in my life. And it lasted for months. That's when I found the Recovery & Repair gel! I was desperate and ready to try anything an everything. This is the only product that has helped calm my skin down drastically.'
settings.author: Naomi

settings.text: 'I thought for sure, when I opened it, this would be a disaster for my sensitive skin. I was WRONG. It feels amazing on my skin and causes no problems. It makes my skin so soft and hydrated.'
settings.author: Meredith

settings.text: 'I had really bad dark patches over my skin and I tried everything going, nothing worked. I tried Seacra and wow, fantastic, the difference in my skin after a week has changed already. So happy and I will buy again.'
settings.author: Tracy B

settings.text: 'Try it. Great product. Already see a difference in my skin. Sunspots minimised, lines more blurred. No residue and non-sticky.'
settings.author: Gaynor M.

settings.text: 'Really nice and skin drinks it in.'
settings.author: Geraldine B.

settings.text: 'Purchased Seacra around 3 weeks ago and I was very sceptical. I had slightly large pores on my nose area and a small whitehead on my nose area as well for the last couple of years. I used everything to get rid of that whitehead but nothing got rid of it. Anyway after using Seacra for nearly 3 weeks, I just noticed the other morning that the whitehead had completely disappeared altogether and my pores are almost invisible wow wow wow. I purchased another two bottles of Seacra red algae recovery and repair gel from TJC. Highly highly recommend. Now this little gem is my Seacra, beautiful complexion. Will definitely be buying some more. I'm in love with Seacra. WOW.'
settings.author: R. Newton.

settings.text: 'Although I was mostly happy wit the amazing skin care I was using, I had these two little annoying dry patches on my chin, my skin on this area was raised and would sometimes be a little sore and really red. I have been using Seacra red algae recovery and repair gel, for a few days and it's gone! It's still a little red, but it's going. The hydration is incredible, it works well with my other brands. I know this gel has other benefits, but if this is all it does for me, then I am extremely happy with this amazing product. Thank you Mark Gould for suggesting it.'
settings.author: Patricia C
